document_data.name: Mol Flesz
document_data.mainbody: '''Mol Flesz''' was a high-ranking member of the "Coin Guard", the city guard of [[Imdolphyn]], as of [[1479 DR]].{{Cite organized play/LFR/Quench the Fire of the Raging God|16}}
document_data.Activities: Mol was an honorable man, with the high sense of honor typical of a [[dragonborn]]. Despite this, rumors abounded that he accepted bribes to overlook certain less than legal contraband coming through the city.
